entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 1:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening then becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
